title: Perma banned for?

I understand that not trying in a game is NOT okay, but seriously? I got banned for literally nothing toxic.

replies.body:
> nothing toxic

You did nothing _but_ be toxic, all game. Rank flaming, K/D flaming, calling your teammates r%%%%%s in creative ways (no, you dont get a pass for obfuscating it), threatening reports, threatening to AFK..

Start taking responsibility for your own behavior unless you want to start racking up permbans in real life as well. Just a suggestion..

Not only that, but judging by the champions they were referring to in the logs, Game 1 was the last game they played here: https://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/3070507627/229439558?tab=overview

Add assisting the enemy team to that list.

StarGift: my red is up soon
StarGift: if you want it j4
StarGift: or aatrox
StarGift: my gromp is up too, same with krugs and raptors
---
StarGift: blue is up soon @j4, come after rift?

You hit 300 ping when you press the 'e' key?

You typed a lot of e's, no wonder your ping was so high.
Seems obvious but I guess just read the llamas post for specifics.
